verses.t: Lord, how are they increased{H7231} that trouble{H6862} me! many{H7227} are they that rise up{H6965} against me.
Many{H7227} there be which say{H559} of my soul{H5315}, There is no help{H3444} for him in God{H430}. Selah{H5542}.
LordBut thou, O {H3068}, art a shield{H4043} for me; my glory{H3519}, and the lifter up{H7311} of mine head{H7218}.for: or, about
I cried{H7121} Lordunto the {H3068} with my voice{H6963}, and he heard{H6030} me out of his holy{H6944} hill{H2022}. Selah{H5542}.
I laid me down{H7901} and slept{H3462}; I awaked{H6974}; Lordfor the {H3068} sustained{H5564} me.
I will not be afraid{H3372} of ten thousands{H7233} of people{H5971}, that have set{H7896} themselves against me round about{H5439}.

Arise{H6965}, LordO {H3068}; save{H3467} me, O my God{H430}: for thou hast smitten{H5221} all mine enemies{H341} upon the cheek bone{H3895}; thou hast broken{H7665} the teeth{H8127} of the ungodly{H7563}.
Salvation{H3444} belongeth Lordunto the {H3068}: thy blessing{H1293} is upon thy people{H5971}. Selah{H5542}.
